mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId } AND MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEMBER_ROLE = 'ROLE_MEMBER'
SELECT COUNT(MEMBER_NO) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId }
SELECT COUNT(MEMBER_NO) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{ memberEmail }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_BIRTHDAY, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_STREET_ADDRESS, MEMBER_DETAIL_ADDRESS, MEMBER_NICKNAME ) VALUES ( #{ memberId }, #{ memberPwd }, #{ memberName }, #{ memberBirthday }, #{ memberGender }, #{ memberPhone }, #{ memberEmail }, #{ memberAddress }, #{ memberStreetAddress }, #{ memberDetailAddress }, #{ memberNickname } )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PWD = #{ memberPwd }, MEMBER_Phone = #{ memberPhone }, MEMBER_EMAIL = #{ memberEmail }, MEMBER_ADDRESS = #{ memberAddress }, MEMBER_STREET_ADDRESS = #{ memberStreetAddress }, MEMBER_DETAIL_ADDRESS = #{ memberDetailAddress }, MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{ memberNickname } WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{ memberNo } AND MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEMBER_CHECK_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER-STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEMBER_NO = { memberNo }
